Module: passwordïƒ

This module is used to query data about passwords.

General usage:

ğŸ¦ > password <submodule>[=enabled]

Results can be exported to a csv file using the keyword â€œexportâ€ at the end of the command:

ğŸ¦ > password <submodule> export

A csv file will be generated in â€œexportsâ€ directory.

password commentïƒ

This submodule tries to find passwords in â€œdescriptionâ€ field, based on the following patterns: â€œpwâ€, â€œpassâ€, â€œmdpâ€ and â€œcodeâ€.

ğŸ¦ > password comment

To filter by enabled users, â€œ=enabledâ€ must be used:

ğŸ¦ > password comment=enabled

password userpasswordïƒ

This submodule tries to find if any passwords are stored in â€œuserpasswordâ€ field.

ğŸ¦ > password userpassword

To filter by enabled users, â€œ=enabledâ€ must be used:

ğŸ¦ > password userpassword=enabled

password changeddateïƒ

This submodule lists all users whose password has not been changed for a given number of days.

By default, it takes 90 days:

ğŸ¦ > password changeddate

To specify custom period, give the number of days (for example, 180 days):

ğŸ¦ > password changeddate 180

This can be useful to check passwords that not meet password age policy.

To filter by enabled users, â€œ=enabledâ€ must be used:

ğŸ¦ > password changeddate=enabled
